original: intros l. induction l as [| a l' IHl]. - left. apply ulist_nil. - destruct (ulista_dec eqA_dec l') as [H1 | H2]. + right. intros contra. apply H2. inversion contra as [eq]. subst. apply ulist_cons. contr. apply ulist_nil. + right. intros contra. apply H2. inversion contra as [eq]. subst. apply ulist_app_inv_l in H1. apply ulist_cons. 1: contr. apply ulist_inv in H1. auto.
